talk.author: did:plc:bfp7n6e2rpr3yo7gpqdr2tfw
talk.utter:
Play store supports staggered rollouts (updates in waves rather than everybody at once), so if you have a horrible bug you can catch it before it affects everyone.

The web version has something similar for features, which may be the case in the app too since they're the same codebase.
